messages.content:
You task is to analyse and parse resume. Identify and extract the following sections:
- Personal Details
- Skills (Technical and Soft)
- Experience (Work and Internships)
- Education (Degrees)
- Certifications (if any)
- Projects (Personal and Academic)
- Awards or Accomplishment (if any)
- Volunteer Work or Activities (if any)
- Hobbies or Interests (if any)

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Here is the resume text:
{ "text" }
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Please split the resume into these sections and provide all the relavant content under each heading. 
Please identify all the main themes, don't make anything up, only use information provided in the context.
Separate only the section headings with a new line. Don't make anything bold expect the headings.
Use proper structure and formatting, don't make it look lengthy. Eg: Skills can be comma separated, no lines in between work experiences, etc.

David Brown
Email: david.brown@example.com | Phone: 555-987-6543

Skills
Ruby, Rails, SQL, Web Development, Team Leadership

Experience
Backend Developer, CodeFactory, Jan 2020 - Present
Developed scalable backend services for various applications. Led a team of developers.
Web Development Intern, WebLab, Jun 2018 - Dec 2018
Assisted in the development of web applications and performed quality assurance.

Education
University of Texas, Austin, B.Sc. in Software Engineering, Sep 2014 - May 2018

Certifications
Certified Ruby Developer, Scrum Master
Projects
Task Management App
Built a task management application with Ruby on Rails.

Awards or Accomplishment
Best Team Lead 2022

Volunteer Work or Activities
Organized local tech meetups.

Personal Details
David Brown, david.brown@example.com, 555-987-6543

Experience

Projects

Volunteer Work or Activities
Organized local tech meetups.
